content: starting in the third chain from the hook double_crochet in next 11 chs 2 double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next 10 chs 2 double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next 10 chs 2 double_crochet in next chain x3 double_crochet in last 12 chs change colour chain 2 turn 73 colour a row 3 double_crochet in next 11 sts 2 double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet in next 2 sts x3 double_crochet in last 12 sts change colour chain 2 turn 85 colour b row 4 double_crochet in next 11 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts x3 double_crochet in last 12 sts change colour chain 2 turn 105 colour d row 5 double_crochet in next 13 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts double_crochet in next 14 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts double_crochet in next 14 sts 2 double_crochet in next 4 sts x3 double_crochet in last 14 sts change colour chain 1 turn 125 colour a row 6 single_crochet in next 17 sts 2 single_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet in next 18 sts 2 single_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet in next 18 sts 2 single_crochet in next 4 sts x3 single_crochet in last 14 sts change colour chain 2 turn 146 colour c row 7 starting in the third chain from the hook double_crochet in next 144 sts chain 1 turn colour e row 8 skip first 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts single_crochet in next st skip 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts single_crochet in next st repeat until the end of the row finish with a single_crochet fasten off you will have 24 fans/scallops in this row 145 colour e ties in order to make the ties attach the yarn in the same colour as colour a to the first stitch of row 1 see picture 1 below chain 50 and fasten_off cut the yarn do the same thing to the last stitch of row 1 too you will have 2 ties that has 50 chs each attach the yarn here chain 1 picture 1 attaching the yarn symbols in this chart abbreviations uk terms chain chain chain chain turning chain 2 chains - turning chain - single_crochet
